attributes.action: £10 Maximum Parking Charge for HGV'S at service areas
attributes.additional_details:
It is  a Legal Requirement for all HGV Drivers to stop after their Legal Working Day and Service area Providers think that it is fair to Charge £25 + to Park up for the Night  even though this is a Legal Requirement.
I am collecting signatures to  ban HGV'S from getting ripped of for Parking in Service Areas and think that a Maximum Charge of £10 would be fair Price to Pay ..Please Sign and Share if you Agree.
